name: No Ring For Old Lemons
description:
No Ring For Old Lemons is a little fighting game made for the Mini Jam 96: Fate, which had the limitation 'Losing is Good'

Controls:

Hold 'Z' and release to throw a punch (and to restart the game once you get to the end)

Left arrow to block

Up, right or down arrows to gracefully recceive hits

Press 'M' to mute the audio

(And in case you were wondering: A lemon is a wrestler who is not believed by an audience and is perceived as a failure.)

-----

Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/RoccoW/single/SuperBluesBros_Banana_Blitz

We have updated the game to add sound and fix some minor issues, however the source for the original version can still be downloaded.
